mapper.select: select p.id, p.staff_id, p.year, p.quarter, p.appraise, p.remarks, s.staff_code, s.staff_name, s.dep_id, p.created_by, p.created_date, p.last_modified_by, p.last_modified_date from hr_performance p left join hr_staff s on p.staff_id = s.id where p.id = #{performanceId}

select p.id, p.staff_id, p.year, p.quarter, p.appraise, p.remarks, s.staff_code, s.staff_name, s.dep_id, p.created_by, p.created_date, p.last_modified_by, p.last_modified_date from hr_performance p left join hr_staff s on p.staff_id = s.id where s.staff_code = #{staffCode} and p.year = #{year} and p.quarter = #{quarter}
